name: What The Hell Chapter 1
description:
K-Flow, A giant king flower, appears out of nowhere on your land. You just got locked out of your house when stumbling upon him. K-Flow, after being banished from the Kindom of Flows (Yes Kindom, not Kingdom). Will you help him get revenge, or help someone else. 

3 Different Ending, as of January 22 2023 only the first 2 endings are available.
